attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent I would like to voice my concern over raising the fees for the
I-600A, Biometrics and application for Citizenship for adopted children. The
process to adopt internationally is already very expensive and increasing these
fees by such large amounts will just add to the financial pressures we are already
facing. In addition, many international adoption process are taking more than the
18-month time limit allowed by the approved I-600A so many adoptive parents are
having to refile an I-600A for the same adoption.

Please reconsider the exorbitant increases you are proposing. If you must
increase the fees, please consider the costs that we adoptive parents are facing
during our adoption process and increase the fees by MINIMAL amounts.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Patricia Eaton
